page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE,COTEHILL
page.content: When I get up on a morning I get washed and then I get ready for school.I have an egg and toast for my breakfast and cornflakes and I have some morning orange. Then I put my shoes and coat on and get in the car and go to school .When I get to school I do the work on the black board then some maths or English. Then we go out side for play time.Then we come in and finish any work off and then we get some more.At dinner time we wash our hands and then have our dinner and then we go out side again and Mrs Reed our dinner lady gives us some sweets. When we come in ,we read then we do a writing practice.Then we go out for a while. Then we come in and have a story.Then we go home I get my old clothes on and I play on my bike with my friend we play freestyle competition until dark.
